passwordpolicy_test.comment: Set 'Enforce password history' to '24 or more password(s)'
Set 'Maximum password age' to '60 or fewer day(s)'

Set 'Minimum password length' to '14 or more character(s)'

Set 'Store passwords using reversible encryption' to 'Disabled'

lockoutpolicy_test.comment: Set 'Account lockout duration' to '15 or more minute(s)'
Set 'Account lockout threshold' to '10 or fewer invalid logon attempt(s)'
Ensure 'Account lockout threshold' is not '0 invalid logon attempt(s)'
Set 'Reset account lockout counter after' to '15 or more minute(s)'

accesstoken_test.comment: Set 'SeNetworkLogonRight' to 'Administrators, Authenticated Users, ENTERPRISE DOMAIN CONTROLLERS' for domain controller
Set 'SeNetworkLogonRight' to 'Administrators, Authenticated Users' for member server
Set 'SeIncreaseQuotaPrivilege' to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE'
Set 'SeInteractiveLogonRight' to 'Administrators, ENTERPRISE DOMAIN CONTROLLERS' for domain controller
Ensure 'SeRemoteInteractiveLogonRight' to 'Administrators, Remote Desktop Users' for member server
Set 'SeCreateGlobalPrivilege' to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE, SERVICE'
Set 'SeCreateSymbolicLinkPrivilege' to 'Administrators and NT VIRTUAL MACHINE\Virtual Machines'
Set 'SeDenyNetworkLogonRight' to 'Guests, Local account and member of Administrators group' for member server
Set 'SeDenyNetworkLogonRight' to 'Guests, Local account' for domain controller
Set 'SeEnableDelegationPrivilege' to 'No One' for member server
Set 'SeImpersonatePrivilege' to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE, SERVICE'
Set 'SeImpersonatePrivilege' to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE, SERVICE', IIS_IUSERS
Ensure 'SeSyncAgentPrivilege' is set to 'No One' for domain controller

registry_test.comment: Set 'passwordexpirywarning' to less than or equal to 14
Set 'passwordexpirywarning' to greater than or equal to 5
Ensure 'NullSessionPipes' is Empty for Member server

Set 'Audit Directory Service Access' to 'Success and Failure'
Set 'Audit Directory Service Changes' to 'Success and Failure'
Ensure 'Audit Other Logon/Logoff Events' is set to 'Success and Failure'

registry_test.comment: Ensure 'PasswordLength' is greater than or equal to '15'
Ensure 'PasswordAgeDays' is less than or equal to '30'
Check that 'MSS: (EnableICMPRedirect) Allow ICMP redirects to override OSPF generated routes' is configured to 'Disabled'
Set 'ScreenSaverGracePeriod' to less than or equal to 5
Set 'Turn off Microsoft Peer-to-Peer Networking Services' to '1'
Ensure 'EMET_Service' is configured to start automatically
Ensure 'FoxitReader' is set to '*\Foxit Reader\Foxit Reader.exe'
Ensure 'PhotoGallary' is set to '*\Windows Live\Photo Gallery\WLXPhotoGallery.exe'
Ensure 'Photoshop' is set to '*\Adobe\Adobe Photoshop CS*\Photoshop.exe'
Ensure 'WindowsMediaPlayer' is set to '*\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe'
Ensure 'MaxIdleTime' is less than or equal to '900000'
Ensure 'MaxIdleTime' is less than or equal to '900000' not '0'
Ensure 'Allow Remote Shell Access' is equal to '0'
Set 'HKEY_USERS\<SID>\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Control Panel\Desktop:ScreenSaveTimeOut' to '900' or less and Not '0'
